summary: An in-depth look at the genesis, production, and legacy of King Kong, one of the most influential films ever made.
cast: Rick Baker|Craig Barron|Rudy Behlmer|Daniel Bennett|Graham Binding|Shaun Bolton|Jon Burlingame|Bob Burns|Ben Burtt|Charles Chiodo|Edward Chiodo|Stephen Chiodo|Randall William Cook|Rich Correll|Mark Cotta Vaz|John Craney|James D'Arc|Joe Dante|Frank Darabont|Wayne Dawson|Sam Fontana|James French|Alex Funke|Ray Harryhausen|John Harvey|Mike Hopkins|Bill Hunt|Peter Jackson|Harry Jay Knowles|John Landis|Scott MacQueen|Ron Magid|Kevin McTurk|Hector Morales|John Morgan|Michael Pangrazio|Michael Pellerin|Nigel Scott|Murray Spivack|Richard Taylor|Phil Tippett|Doug E. Turner|Don Waller|Dave Whitehead|Fay Wray
title: RKO Production 601: The Making of 'Kong, the Eighth Wonder of the World'
